page.title: 19Blackgang-A World of Its Own
page.content: Blackgang Chine is brilliant. I think that it is the best place on the Island. I like the illuminated Blackgang at night. It is a world of its own. The maze is good- I wish I lived next door to Blackgang Chine.I feel sad that it is crumbling away.The Island would never be the same without it. Over 5000 bushes were used to make the maze. It was first constructed in 1963. The Dabell family have always owned it. Thousands of tourists every year go to see it. The Cowboy Town is good, everything in it looks real,the Blacksmith,General Stores, Sheriff's Office and Jail.Dinosaur Land is fun with full size dinosaurs. Blackgang Chine is great,I enjoy the maze best.
